alert.note: Alert for Pacific; Wahkiakum (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 06 at 6:24AM PST until January 07 at 12:17PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Portland OR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Washington...Oregon... Grays River near Rosburg affecting Wahkiakum County. Nehalem River near Foss affecting Tillamook and Clatsop Counties. Wilson River near Tillamook affecting Tillamook County. Naselle River near Naselle affecting Pacific and Wahkiakum Counties. Willapa River near Willapa affecting Pacific County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Naselle River near Naselle. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...Above 16.0 feet, expect flooding of several homes and roads along and near the Naselle River. Portions of State Route 4 will likely be flooded. Widespread pasture land flooding also occurs above this level. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 AM PST Thursday the stage was 9.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 16.6 feet late this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 630 PM PST.
